mapper.select: select l.*,b.b_area1,b.b_area2,b.b_address from parking_lot_tbl l Join building_tbl b On l.b_code = b.b_code where l.b_code = #{b_code}
select * from parking_lot_tbl l Join building_tbl b on b.b_code = l.b_code Join parking_basic_price_tbl pb On b.b_code=pb.b_code
select t.*,b.b_area1,b.b_area2,b.b_address,l.b_name from parking_lot_tbl l Join parking_ticket_info_tbl t On l.b_code = t.b_code Join building_tbl b On l.b_code = b.b_code where l.b_code = #{b_code}
select t.*,b.b_area1,b.b_area2,b.b_address,l.b_name from parking_lot_tbl l Join parking_ticket_info_tbl t On l.b_code = t.b_code Join building_tbl b On l.b_code = b.b_code where t.p_code = #{p_code}
mapper.update: update parking_ticket_order_tbl set p_state=#{p_state},pay_day=#{pay_day} where p_ocode = #{p_ocode}
mapper.select: select userid,name,hp from user_member_tbl where userid=#{userid}
select * from parking_history_tbl h Join parking_lot_tbl l On l.b_code = h.b_code where h.parking_state = 0 and h.car_number LIKE '%'||#{carnum}||'%' and is_delete ='N'
select * from parking_history_tbl h Join parking_lot_tbl l On l.b_code = h.b_code where h.parking_state = 0 and h.inoutcode =#{inoutcode}
select * from parking_payment_tbl where inoutcode = #{inoutcode} and pb_state = 2
mapper.update: update parking_payment_tbl set pb_state=#{pb_state},pay_day=#{pay_day} where pay_seq = #{pay_seq}
mapper.select: select o.p_code,i.p_type,i.hourly,count(o.p_code) as count from parking_ticket_order_tbl o Join parking_ticket_history_tbl h on o.p_ocode = h.p_ocode join parking_ticket_info_tbl i on i.p_code = o.p_code where h.userid = #{userid} and i.b_code = #{b_code} and h.use_day is null Group by o.p_code,i.p_type,i.hourly

select h.parking_code,i.p_type,i.hourly from parking_ticket_order_tbl o Join parking_ticket_history_tbl h on o.p_ocode = h.p_ocode join parking_ticket_info_tbl i on i.p_code = o.p_code where h.userid = #{userid} and o.p_code = #{p_code} and h.use_day is null and rownum <= #{count} order by o.pay_day

select o.p_code,i.p_type,i.hourly,count(o.p_code) as count,b.b_name from parking_ticket_order_tbl o Join parking_ticket_history_tbl h on o.p_ocode = h.p_ocode join parking_ticket_info_tbl i on i.p_code = o.p_code join parking_lot_tbl b on i.b_code = b.b_code where h.userid = #{userid} and h.use_day is null Group by o.p_code,i.p_type,i.hourly,b.b_name

select p.pay_day,h.car_number,b.b_name,p.pay_type,count(p.pay_day) as count,p.pay_enable_time,pay_price from parking_history_tbl h Join parking_payment_tbl p on h.inoutcode = p.inoutcode Join building_tbl b on b.b_code = h.b_code where p.userid =#{userid} and p.pb_state = 2 group by p.pay_day,h.car_number,b.b_name,p.pay_type,p.pay_enable_time,pay_price order by p.pay_day desc
